title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2673/86 of 27 August 1986 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on ethyl acetate, falling within subheading 29.14 A II c) ex 1, originating in Argentina, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3599/85 apply
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2673/86
of 27 August 1986
re-establishing the levying of customs duties on ethyl acetate, falling within subheading 29.14 A II c) ex 1, originating in Argentina, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3599/85 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 August 1986.
For the Commission
Henning CHRISTOPHERSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 352, 30. 12. 1985, p. 1.
